summary:
Snapchat is a unique messaging app with over 293 million daily users. It lets people send photos and messages that disappear after viewing. The app also offers "Stories," which are collections of snaps that last for 24 hours, and "Discover" for brand content. Users can even protect their photos with passwords. 

Created by Stanford students, Snapchat focuses on mobile-first social media, using augmented reality and virtual stickers. It's especially popular among younger users, raising privacy concerns for parents. The app continues to grow and improve its security features.
title: Snapchat
